SEARCH
Package SnakeGame

Class Snake

java.lang.Object
GameEngine.GameObject
SnakeGame.Snake
All Implemented Interfaces:
ISpatialComponent
public class Snake extends GameObject implements ISpatialComponent
Represents the snake the snake has a series of SnakeUnits as it's body.
See Also:
  • SnakeUnit

  • Constructor Details

    • Snake

      public Snake(Point initialPos, Direction initialDir, int unitSize, boolean isFilled, char tailChar, char headChar) throws SnakeGameException
      Instantiates a snake. same as
      invalid reference 
      Snake#Snake(Point,Direction,int,boolean,char,char,TerminalColour.Foreground)
      but with no colour
      Throws:
      SnakeGameException

    • Snake

      public Snake(Point initialPos, Direction initialDir, int unitSize, boolean isFilled, char tailChar, char headChar, TerminalColour.Foreground terminalColour, Color graphicalColor) throws SnakeGameException
      Instantiates a snake.
      Parameters:
      initialPos - the initial snake position
      initialDir - the initial snake direction
      unitSize - the size of one snake segment
      isFilled - if the snake should be drawn with filled segments
      tailChar - the character for the snake's tail
      headChar - the character for the snake's head
      colour - the colour of the snake
      Throws:
      SnakeGameException - if trying to instantiate a snake in an invalid position
